drops.name: Adamantite bar
drops.drop_requirements: <ref group=d>Aviansies in the God Wars Dungeon drop unnoted bars until completion of the Hard [[Fremennik Diary]], while those in the Wilderness God Wars Dungeon always drop noted bars regardless of diary completion.</ref>

drops.name: Ensouled aviansie head
drops.drop_requirements: <ref group=d>Aviantese in the [[God Wars Dungeon]] drop the ensouled head at a rate of 1/35, while those in the [[Wilderness God Wars Dungeon]] drop it at a rate of 1/20.</ref>{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Kieren|url=https://twitter.com/JagexKieren/status/689153404288004097|date=18 Jan 2016|Archiveurl=http://archive.fo/gl8ED|Archivedate=25 Mar 2019|quote=Fair few people asking about ensouled head drop rates... Here you go! [https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CZBdXm_WUAIRceC.png:large]}}

drops.name: Mysterious emblem
drops.drop_requirements: <ref name=wildytask group=d>Only dropped while on a [[slayer assignment]] given by [[Krystilia]].</ref><ref group=d>Emblem drop rates for levels 69, 71, 79, 84, 94, 97, 131, and 137 are 1/120, 1/123.5, 1/116.5, 1/112, 1/117.5, 1/115.5, 1/97.5, and 1/93 respectfully.</ref>{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/872520473749356549|date=7 June 2017|archiveurl=http://archive.fo/swS9N|archivedate=25 Mar 2019|quote=It's calculated off the HP: 1 in (155 - (HP/2)) There's none with HP over 300, but it'd disregard values higher than that.}}

drops.name: Clue scroll (hard)
drops.drop_requirements: <ref group=d>1/64 if a [[Ring of wealth (i)]] is worn and fought in the [[Wilderness]].</ref>{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/678879639230631937|archiveurl=http://archive.fo/0swBC|archivedate=May 18 2019|date=Dec 21 2015|quote=1/128.}}

drops.name: Slayer's enchantment
drops.drop_requirements: {{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/973892117675298816|date=14 March 2018|archiveurl=http://archive.fo/CWYhV|archivedate=5 June 2019|quote=For nastier bosses (e.g. Callisto) it's 1/30. For other things it scales between 1/320 and 1/80 as the NPC's HP scales from 0 to 300.}}<ref name=wildytask group=d /><ref group=d>Enchantment drop rates for levels 69, 71, 79, 84, 94, 97, 131, and 137 are 1/264, 1/270, 1/254, 1/252, 1/260, 1/242, 1/228, and 1/221 respectfully.</ref>

drops.name: Brimstone key
drops.drop_requirements: <ref group=d>Only dropped if killed on a [[slayer assignment]] given by [[Konar quo Maten]].</ref><ref group=d>Brimstone key drop rates for levels 69, 71, 73, 79, 83, 84, 89, 92, 94, 97, 131, 137, and 148 are 1/292.2, 1/268.2, 1/245.8, 1/188.2, 1/157.8, 1/151.2, 1/124.2, 1/112.8, 1/101.8, 1/107.2, 1/93.8, 1/92.6, and 1/90.4 respectfully.</ref>{{CiteTwitter|url=https://twitter.com/JagexKieren/status/1083783815141707781|author=Mod Kieren|date=16 January 2019|quote=0.2*(CBLEVEL - 100)^2 + 100}}{{CiteTwitter|url=https://twitter.com/JagexKieren/status/1083781544135847936|author=Mod Kieren|date=16 January 2019|quote=It follows a curve up until level 100 then scales linearly between those 2 values upto level 350 combat. Creatures over thsi{{sic}} will cap at 1/50. [https://pbs.twimg.com/media/DwpdLK2W0AEynZy.jpg]}}
